results.name: The limit of row A182730(n,.) as n-> infinity.
comment: Largest part of the n-th partition of the table 2.0  mentioned in A135010. For the table 2.0 see A182982.
link: Omar E. Pol, Illustration of the shell model of partitions (3D view)
xref: One together with where records occur give A182746.
